runs.comm: length ball on off stump. AB makes a bit of room to play through the off side, pushes it carefully towards point
a bit more width and he slaps it hard, can't beat the man at extra cover
flat, fired in towards AB, who's making room again. Goes with the arm to cramp him and he punches to extra cover
another slider, no room at all. Punched back towards the bowler off the back foot
a bit slower this time and AB drives inside-out to the right of extra cover. Long-off runs to his left to stop it. Either he didn't really time it or the outfield is a little slow

gone! That was another length ball on off stump, going with the angle towards middle. AB made room to carve it through the off side and he ended up picking out Mashrafe at cover point, takes a simple catch at head height. Super start for Bangladesh.
length ball, goes with the angle towards middle. Comes forward to defend, plays for the turn, rolls off inside edge towards square leg
back of a length, worked away off the back foot, with the turn from outside off, to midwicket
flat, angling into the pads, tucked away quietly to mid-on
back of a length close to off stump, skips away from the line to punch through square cover
flat, angling into middle and leg, worked to square leg
down the track now, doesn't reach the pitch of this flat ball on off stump, clips it towards midwicket
length ball on off stump, goes on the back foot, works it to midwicket
down the track now, clips with the turn towards deep mid-on
down the track, gets too close to the pitch for the drive through the off side, ends up dragging it back to the bowler
short ball, comes very slowly off the pitch, and Faf has to swivel his entire body weight through that pull to get power into the shot, finds the boundary at deep midwicket
down the track again, and this time Arafat slows it down a touch and bowls it a bit shorter, Faf ends up defending towards short extra cover
ooh. Flat and full, fired in towards middle and leg. Faf looks to make room and drive inside-out and it goes with the arm and rolls off the inside edge, onto pad, and narrowly misses leg stump
down the pitch comes de Kock, drags the ball from outside off into the gap to the left of mid-on and midwicket runs around to stop it
down the track again and this time he manages to get inside the line and lift it with the turn over the covers, just about clears the rope
sees de Kock moving around the crease and fires it down the leg side. De Kock misses the sweep
flat, back of a length on off stump, pushed towards mid-on for a single
down the track comes Faf this time, and Nasir offers him just enough width to chip the ball over the top, to the left of mid-off, and find the extra cover boundary
down the track again, this time it's fuller and closer to his pads, flicked away to deep midwicket

another! Similar dismissal to AB. It's a length ball with a bit of width outside off. On a slow pitch like this, it isn't easy to control those slashes through the off side, and he ends up slicing it softly into the hands of the cover point fielder
floated up slow towards middle and leg. Faf looks for the flick, goes too early at it, pops a leading edge down to long-off
another loopy ball, clipped with the turn from off stump towards long-on
down the track comes Faf once again and Shakib follows him with a slowly flighted ball. Looks for the flick and inside-edges to short fine leg
even slower, angling into the batsman, comes forward and tucks it away towards square leg
tossed up on off stump, presses forward and blocks it back to the bowler
down the track again, clipped from off stump down to long-on
length ball, a bit of movement in towards off stump. Duminy looks to drive on the up, away from his body, and inside-edges into the leg side

back of a length, angling across, and there's that cutter going away from Faf, who shuffles across and looks to work it against the angle, takes his outside edge and bounces down in front of the diving Sarkar at slip
another cutter, is it? Faf looks to make room and lift that over the covers, can't make contact
length ball on middle stump, whipped towards deep midwicket
full and wide, leans out to drive, slices it to backward point
length ball, again the line invites the cover drive, but there's a bit of movement in off the pitch and he nearly chops it onto his stumps
back of a length on off stump, not much turn. Faf goes on the back foot and pokes it away into the covers
down the track, meets this loopy delivery on the full, and drives firmly down the ground, between the bowler and the stumps, and long-on can't get to it in time to stop the boundary
skips out of his crease again, maybe a touch too early, and Shakib drops his length back just a touch, forces Duminy to block it back to him
a bit quicker on off stump, goes back and chops it towards backward point
slow, angling into middle stump, Faf brings out the slog sweep and Nasir, running to his left from deep square leg, makes a good stop on the bounce
tossed up on middle and off, comes forward and works it with the spin into the leg side
down the track, flicks over the top, with the angle from around the wicket, bounces down to Nasir at deep midwicket
back of a length and enough width for Faf to rock back and flat-bat it powerfully to the cover boundary
length ball angling across towards off stump. Goes on the back foot and dabs it gently to the left of the short cover fielder
tossed up on leg stump and du Plessis isn't quite to the pitch to drive inside-out, almost pops a return catch
length ball on off stump, pushed gently into the covers for one
down the track comes Faf as Gazi tosses it up on off stump, whips it away towards deep midwicket
slower ball, full outside off. Faf moves across and whips it through backward square leg
back of a length outside off, dabbed down to third man
another slower ball outside off, and again Faf drags it into the leg side, to the man at the deep square leg boundary

another slower ball on off stump, and Duminy doesn't reach the pitch as he skips down the track. Looks to work it leg side, pops it off the leading edge back down the ground, bowler's follow-through had taken him too far to the left of the pitch to be able to go for the return catch
another slower ball and this time Faf comes down the track, skips inside the line, and lofts inside-out over the covers
back of a length outside off, shuffles across and whips it towards deep midwicket
keeps low as Faf goes back to a length ball, nearly slides on to off and middle but he jams his bat down just in time to work it through square leg
full on the pads, clipped away towards deep square leg
down the track and Gazi slides it across him, outside off, forces him to push defensively into the off side
length ball angling across du Plessis, who makes room and pushes it away towards deep point
tossed up on middle stump, driven down to long-on
short ball, and the around-the-wicket angle gives Faf enough width to be able to carve it up and over square cover
back of a length, angling across Duminy, who is beaten trying to make room and cut. Mushfiqur is standing up to the stumps
fuller now, angling away. Looks to hit that over mid-off, I think, and ends up slicing it wider than he likes, over Tamim, running back from the circle at extra cover
short  on off stump, pulled down to deep square leg

shot. That was back of a length on off stump, and he shuffled across and whipped it over short fine leg, to his left. Nasir is electric in the deep, runs across from deep square leg and puts in the dive to stop the boundary
back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to work it to deep square leg
back of a length on off stump, Faf stays low through the pull, accounting for the lack of bounce, plays it to deep midwicket

down the track and that's an excellent catch from that man Nasir. Looks to hit over wide mid-on, maybe, but doesn't reach the pitch of it. Turns in quite a long way and he ends up dragging it in the air towards deep midwicket. Nasir loses it in the flight, initially, and moves to his left, away from the ball, before correcting course and falling forward and to his right to take it inches off the turf
shortish on middle stump, and that is a super pull from Faf, rocks deep in his crease and pulls into the gap between the converging deep midwicket and long-on fielders
fuller now, on middle and off, flicked to deep midwicket
down the track and Sunny fires it into Miller's pads, clips it down to long-on
length ball on middle stump, worked away towards deep midwicket to bring up his half-century. On this pitch, 50 off 35 is a pretty good effort.
length ball, a bit of offcut towards middle and off, clipped towards backward square leg
another slower ball, dragged from a fair way outside off to the fielder at square leg
back of a length outside off, shuffles across and works it into the gap at midwicket
full on off stump, clipped gently into the on side, lovely use of the hands, long-on has to run forward and to his right to field it, and that gives the batsmen enough time to take two
back of a length on off and middle, jumps across to tuck it towards forward square leg

whoa. Back of a length, angling across towards off stump, beats the inside edge of Miller, who's stuck on the crease trying to work it across the line, just misses the top of off stump, and Mushfiqur fumbles
slow, quite a long way outside off. Faf goes on the back foot and uses his wrists to manouevre it into the midwicket region

given! It was tossed up slowly and Miller, planting his front leg down the pitch and looking to work it across the line, is beaten by the turn, misses his inside edge and hits his pad in front of middle and off. Looked to have straightened enough to hit the stumps, and Shakib becomes Bangladesh's leading T20 wicket-taker, going past Abdur Razzak
tossed up on off stump, checked drive to long-off takes Rilee off the mark
tossed up on middle stump, keeps his front pad out of the way and pokes it towards cover
a bit closer to the pads this time and he clips it down to long-on
shortish ball, turning into middle stump. Rilee rocks back and pulls authoritatively to the wide long-on boundary
and there's another cutter, moving away from leg stump to square up Faf, who does well to defend with soft hands
another cutter, back of a length and going across, beats the top edge of Faf, who leans back and tries half-heartedly to cut
high full-toss on middle and off, slugged away towards deep midwicket, and the umpire calls a no-ball
another full-toss, just outside off, clubbed away towards deep midwicket

back of a length on off stump, goes on the back foot and dabs towards point. They go for the single and complete it without too many alarms, even though Shakib hits the stumps direct at the bowler's end
slower ball, cuts into Rilee as he tries to work the ball into the leg side, and pops off his thigh pad towards backward point. Extra bounce too

rare bad ball from Mustafizur, short and wide with third man in the circle. Faf merely has to lean back and tap the ball on the top of its bounce to send it racing away for four to the right of short third man
tossed up on off stump and he makes room to drive, can't beat extra cover
again he tries to make room to drive, it barely comes on and he ends up chopping it down towards cover
closer to the stumps now and Rilee drives it down to long-on
flat, looks to cramp the batsman for room by firing it in quicker, ends up sliding down the leg side
on the pads now, worked away towards deep square leg
shortish ball on off stump, reverse-pulled to short third man

appeal for lbw but there's no way that's out. Rilee looked to sweep and he had got his front leg a long way outside off stump. Ball popped into the off side off the pad. Given as runs, so maybe there was an inside-edge too
slower ball outside off, comes down the track and jabs it towards mid-off, was looking to drive through cover but he got too close to the pitch of the ball
low full-toss outside off, driven to the right of mid-off, Tamim falls to his right to stop it
another full-toss. Faf clears his front leg and swipes it into the leg side, bottom hand coming off the handle, and Sabbir fumbles on the boundary, allowing them to steal another run
on the pads, tucked away towards long leg
shuffles across his stumps and Mustafizur gets it to cut in and rap him on the pads, but Rilee had moved a fair way outside the line
shortish ball outside off, barely came on as Faf reached out to cut, ends up hitting it early and hitting it to long-off
flat, angled into leg stump. Faf looks to make room, can't find any, pulls towards midwicket
down the track and Nasir pulls his length back on off stump, pushes it gently into the gap at extra cover and they pick up two
full on leg stump, whipped to long-on
a bit of flight and that's a clean strike from Rilee, skips out of his crease and swings his arms through the line to hit it over the bowler's head and clear the rope behind him
trying to be too cute, Rilee, making room to late-cut a fairly full ball, turned and bounced past the open face of his angled bat
shot, and this is a good over for South Africa. Just a bit short and Rilee is quick with his hands to reverse-pull to the backward point boundary
back of a length on off stump, dabbed away to third man
bowler sees Rilee shaping for the paddle and bowls it full and wide outside off. Checks his shot and plays a chipped sweep towards deep backward square leg
full cutter on off stump and Faf jams his bat down to jab it towards point. Shakib's arm has been pinpoint today, hits direct at the batsman's end this time, but Rilee is home with the dive

full on off stump and Faf goes over the top, it was the slower one and he didn't quite time it. Drops into the gap between mid-off, running back to the boundary, and deep midwicket chasing to his left

ha ha! Not sure if the bat travelled a longer distance than the ball. Went across and down on his knee to sweep over short fine leg, and top-edged it in the air and lost his grip on the handle. Bat and ball both looped into the vacant backward square leg region
boom. Rilee comes down the track, clears his front leg, and the ball is in the perfect slot for him to swing freely through the line and clear the wide long-on boundary
back of a length, following the  batsman who's backing away from the stumps, slapped to extra cover
full-toss outside leg, swept to the right of deep backward square leg
down the track and Shakib floats one across Rilee, who flat-bats it hard to the left of Litton, who puts in the slide from long-off to stop the ball
down the track, driven through the covers
very full on off stump, Rilee gets his legs out of the way and drives hard but straight to Gazi at extra cover

down the track and that's a missed stumping, but it's the last ball and it won't matter. Rilee ends up yorking himself, inside-edges and it rolls down to Mushfiq, who fumbles and Rilee can get back in the crease before he can do anything about it
